Class BoardRenderer

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.ui.BoardRenderer
public class BoardRenderer extends Object
BoardRenderer - Renders the static game board background. Single Responsibility: Initialize and maintain the game board visual representation. Responsibilities: - Create the 25x10 game board grid - Render board background cells - Apply consistent board styling - Manage board dimensions and layout This separates board initialization from dynamic brick rendering. Works with BrickRenderer for complete board visualization.

    • initializeBoard

      public javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle[][] initializeBoard(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane boardPane)
      Initializes the game board with background cells. Creates a 25x10 grid with styled cells.
      Parameters:
      boardPane - The GridPane to initialize as the game board
      Returns:
      A 2D array of Rectangles representing the board cells

    • getBoardDimensions

      public int[] getBoardDimensions()
      Gets board dimensions.
      Returns:
      An int array with [width, height]

    • updateBoardCell

      public void updateBoardCell(int row, int col, int colorCode, javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle[][] displayMatrix)
      Updates a specific board cell color. Used when bricks lock into place on the board.
      Parameters:
      row - The row index
      col - The column index
      colorCode - The color code for the brick
      displayMatrix - The board matrix

    • clearBoardRow

      public void clearBoardRow(int row, javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle[][] displayMatrix)
      Clears a row on the board (used for line clear visualization).
      Parameters:
      row - The row index to clear
      displayMatrix - The board matrix
